005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IIntegerItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IArrayItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
018
019import java.util.List;
020
021import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
022
023public class ArraySize {
024  @NonNull
025  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
026      .name("size")
027      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_ARRAY)
028      .deterministic()
029      .contextIndependent()
030      .focusIndependent()
031      .argument(IArgument.builder()
032          .name("array")
033          .type(IArrayItem.class)
034          .one()
035          .build())
036      .returnType(IIntegerItem.class)
037      .returnOne()
038      .functionHandler(ArraySize::execute)
039      .build();
040
041  /**
042   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
043   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-size">array:size</a>.
044   *
045   * @param array
046   *          the arrays to join
047   * @return a new combined array
048   */
049  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
050  @NonNull
051  private static ISequence<IIntegerItem> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
052      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
053      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
054      IItem focus) {
055    IArrayItem<?> array = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true)));
056
057    return ISequence.of(IIntegerItem.valueOf(array.size()));
058  }
059}
